Transform your home's exterior and protect it from harsh weather conditions with Maco Painting's exceptional exterior painting services. With over 20 years of experience serving the Philadelphia suburbs, Chester, Delaware, and Montgomery counties, and the Main Line, we deliver premium quality finishes that enhance curb appeal while providing lasting protection.

Why Choose Maco Painting for Exterior Painting?

With over 20 years of experience, Maco Painting uses premium-quality paints, expert techniques, and advanced prep to ensure your home's exterior remains beautiful and protected for years.

  • Exceptional Surface Preparation: Our thorough preparation process includes power washing, scraping, sanding, and priming to ensure optimal paint adhesion and longevity.
  • Premium Materials: We use only high-quality paints and materials specifically formulated for exterior applications and local weather conditions.
  • Expert Application: Our skilled painters utilize specialized techniques for different exterior surfaces to ensure beautiful, durable results.
  • Comprehensive Property Protection: We carefully protect your landscaping, windows, and surrounding areas during the entire painting process.

Our Exterior Painting Process

Surface Preparation & Protection

We meticulously prepare all surfaces with power washing, scraping, and sanding, followed by priming to ensure long-lasting results. Our preparation process includes:

  • Thorough cleaning to remove dirt, mildew, and loose paint
  • Careful scraping and sanding of degraded areas
  • Specialized dustless sanding technology for cleaner, healthier work environments
  • Premium primers applied to bare wood and problem areas
  • Caulking of gaps and seams to prevent moisture intrusion

Application Techniques

Using a combination of brush, roller, and sprayer techniques, we tailor our application methods based on your home's exterior material to achieve the best results:

  • Siding: Whether wood, vinyl, fiber cement, or stucco, we use the appropriate application technique for optimal coverage and durability
  • Trim & Accents: Detailed brush work ensures clean lines and proper protection of trim, fascia, and soffits
  • Doors & Windows: Specialized finishes for these high-visibility and high-touch areas
  • Porches & Decks: Weather-resistant coatings that withstand foot traffic and exposure

Protecting Your Property

We protect landscaping, windows, and surrounding areas during prep and application, ensuring a clean and flawless finish:

  • Careful coverage of plants, walkways, and outdoor furnishings
  • Protection of windows, doors, and hardware
  • Daily cleanup to maintain a neat, organized work site
  • Final inspection and touch-up to ensure perfection

Comprehensive Exterior Painting Services

Our exterior painting services include:

  • Complete House Painting: Full exterior transformations
  • Trim & Accent Work: Refresh the details that make your home distinct
  • Deck & Porch Staining/Painting: Protect these outdoor living spaces
  • Door & Window Painting: Enhance curb appeal with fresh entry points
  • Soffits, Fascia & Gutters: Attention to often-overlooked areas
  • Garage Doors & Outbuildings: Coordinate all structures on your property
